ProxyEndpoint:
<#list preFlow.request.steps as step>
            
                ${step.name}
            
            </#list>
        
        
            <#list preFlow.response.steps as step>
            
                ${step.name}
            
            </#list>
        
    
    
        
            <#list postFlow.request.steps as step>
            
                ${step.name}
            
        </#list>
        
        
            <#list postFlow.response.steps as step>
            
                ${step.name}
            
            </#list>
        
    
    
        <#list flows as flow>
        
            ${util.escapeXml(flow.operation.description)}
            
            
            (proxy.pathsuffix MatchesPath "${flow.path}") and (request.verb = "${util.toUpperCase(flow.verb)}")
        
        </#list>
    
    
        ${basePath}
        
        <#list virtualHosts as virtualHost>
        ${virtualHost}
        </#list>
    
    <#list routes as route>
    
        <#if route.condition != null>
        ${route.condition}
        </#if>
        ${route.target}
    
    </#list>
